desc.cn: RBAC查找是一个CLI，可让您轻松找到与任何用户，服务帐户或组名称绑定的Kubernetes角色和集群角色。每个版本都用goreleaser生成二进制文件，以进行简单安装
desc.en: RBAC Lookup is a CLI that allows you to easily find Kubernetes roles and cluster roles bound to any user, service account, or group name. Binaries are generated with goreleaser for each release for simple installation
